showScoreExcerpt:
CRITIC’S PICK: “If ‘Summer, 1976’ feels too comfortable to be fashionable, it’s sharply observant, too, and subtly, insistently feminist — more than the wisp of a two-hander that it might first appear to be.”

Read more
